title: Facebook free mystery champion
body: how do i get it and when do i get it?

replies.body:
As others have said, you do so through the client. 

You must connect from 11:59PM PDT on 6/28 through 11:59PM PDT on 6/29 so we can unlock your Mystery Champ! You'll receive your Mystery Champ by July 1st.
That seem like a pretty tight window.
You'll just need to connect your Facebook once during this time (if you haven't already). It's also to let people know when they can unlink their accounts, if they don't want them to stay connected.
